pages.text: Forged in the $(blood)Hellfire Forge$() using nature-aligned components. This reagent captures the boundless essence of growth and life.

A reagent infused with the boundless essence of nature and mana. This catalyst can be combined with a $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an Alchemy Array to create the $(l:animus:sigil_boundless_nature)Sigil of Boundless Nature$().

pages.title: Philosophy
pages.text: This reagent bridges two magical systems - Blood Magic's Life Essence and Botania's mana. When forged into a sigil, it creates a conduit that allows practitioners to seamlessly convert between these two fundamental forces of magic.
